ygData.subject: Re: Race against time ~Wheekjack-X & Maxima
ygData.msgSnippet: That, and the fact that the rpg was first intended as Neo Beast Wars, Beast War Characters being a lot smaller than G1 chars. It might change one day, though.

That, and the fact that the rpg was first intended as Neo Beast Wars,
Beast War Characters being a lot smaller than G1 chars. It might
change one day, though.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > In a message dated 2/3/03 9:26:17 AM Central Standard Time, 
> > wingedwarrior41@h... writes:
> > 
> > 
> > > OOC: 16 feet is the current size limit, and the gestelts we had 
> were
> > > from 30 to 50 feet tall. What could happen is that Wheeljack 
> builds
> > > her old form on top of her current one, making her smaller but 
> legal
> > > in size.
> > > 
> > > 
> > 
> > Hmmm.. very well... 
> > 
> > I'm just curious as to how that size chart came about though.
> 
> Well, imagine the automatic slaughter that would ensue when someone 
> brings a character the relative size of Omega Supreme, or worse, 
> Trypticon into a battle, and you'll see why it makes sense.
